item.title: Updated description for Authy
item.description: https://authy.com) - Two-factor authentication (2FA - Two-factor authentication (2FA) on multiple devices, with backups. Drop-in replacement for Google Authenticator. Free for up to 100 successful authentications.

item.title: Add CloudMailin.com
item.description: https://www.cloudmailin.com/ - Incoming email via HTTP POST and transactional outbound - 10,000 free emails/month

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.xirsys.com - Global network of STUN / TURN servers with a generous free tier.

item.title: added connectycube.com
item.description:
https://connectycube.com - Unlimited chat messages, p2p voice & video calls, files attachments and push notifications. Free for apps up to 20K MAU.
https://connectycube.com - APIs for realtime messaging, voice & video calling, push notifications, files storage and users management. Free for apps up to 20K MAU.

item.title: Add Qovery
item.description: https://www.qovery.com - Qovery is the simplest way to deploy your full-stack apps on AWS, GCP and Azure. It is free web hosting for developers with Database, SSL, a global CDN, and auto deploys from Git.

item.title: Update Contentful
item.description: https://www.contentful.com/ - Headless CMS. Content management and delivery APIs in the cloud. Comes with one free Community space that includes 5 users, 25K records, 48 Content Types, 2 locales.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.
